QuestData.Title: Break in Communications: Dreadwatch Outpost
QuestData.Description: I'm not gonna lie to you, $n. What I'm about to ask you to do is suicide. Chance of failure is about 95%.$B$BAll communication from Dreadwatch Outpost has been severed. With the worgen constantly rushing us we have no means by which to get to Dreadwatch to check on our soldiers. I need you to head south to the outpost and check on our soldiers. I'll keep in contact through the Forsaken communication device - F.C.D. - from here on out.$B$BKEEP CLEAR OF THE MAIN ROAD.
QuestData.PortraitTurnInText: Dreadwatch was our most fortified outpost.
QuestData.RewardText: <The F.C.D. crackles with static.>$B$BDreadwatch is lost? This is bad, $n. Real bad.$B$BIf Dreadwatch is compromised it means we've lost Gilneas City.
